result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Choua Xiong

defendant.name: Xiong, Choua
defendant.address: 500 Forest Street Marathon County Jail, Wausau, WI 54403

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 10:22 am 
INCLUDES 14CF665 AND 15CM400. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Def appears in person, in custody with Atty Kat Jackan in 14CF665 and Atty Tina Abernethy-Mays in 15CM400.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

State moves to: 
In 14CF665: Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 3 (Maintain Drug Trafficking Place/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM400: Ct. 1 (DC/Repeater)>>D&RI.
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: In 14CF665: Ct. 1 (Possess with Intent - Amphetamine/2nd and Subsequent Offense)>>GUILTY. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Def makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: 9 years imprisonment - 4 years IC and 5 years ES - CONDITIONS of ES: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; fulltime employment/schooling/combination of the 2 of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 10 hours CS per week; absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; DNA sample and surcharge; CC. 
COURT finds the def is entitled to 340 days sentence credit. 
COURT finds the def eligible for CIP and SAP after serving 1.5 years of confinement. 
COURT ORDERS sentence to run concurrent to any sentence def is currenlty serving. 
COURT remands def into the custody of MCSD for transport to the WI State Prison System. 

Adj: 10:36 am
Status conference on July 10, 2015 at 02:40 pm.
Pre-trial conference on June 12, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 2:45 pm  
INCLUDES 14CF665 AND 15CM400. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Deft appears in person, in custody with Atty Amanda Ley for Kyle Reimann. 

WAIVER OF PRELIM IN 14CF665. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed. 
Court questions deft as to waiver. 
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. 
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. 
Information filed. Reading Waived.
Plea: 
Not Guilty. 
PTC set for 6/12/2015 at 10am. 
Bond: Continued. 

Adj: 2:49 pm
Review hearing on May 20, 2015 at 02:15 pm.
Status conference on May 11, 2015 at 08:55 am.
Status conference on April 21, 2015 at 09:00 am.
